value:
Sleepy... There's something about
this place I find relaxing. It reminds
me of the Divine Dragon Grounds.

Over my three millennia, I've said
hello and farewell countless times.
But I will always remember you.

Thank you for bringing me here—I can
be reunited with many familiar faces,
including my precious Mar-Mar!

We should take the time to chat.
You seem different from the people
of this world and the "Heroes."

I really do enjoy roaming this place.
Don't you, $Nu?$k$pNo matter how old I get, new worlds
are always exciting!

I bring greetings from your friend
$Nf.$k$pValue your friendship—a good friend
is a comfort forever.

I vow to protect this world
I share with the Heroes.

I miss being in the heat of
battle like this!

It must be my three millennia
catching up with me.

You have granted me new power.
I will wield it at your side.

I am Tiki. As a member of the Divine
Dragon Tribe, I can turn into a
dragon! Some call me the Voice.

Tell me...do you look forward to
or dread the day you'll go
home from this world?$k$pPersonally, I can't stop thinking
about the sad day I will have to
part with all my new friends.$k$pThe thought of saying good-bye to
you is especially sad. I suppose it's
a sign of how close we've grown.$k$pHeh. That's borrowing trouble from
the future, isn't it? Better to
concentrate on the happy present.$k$pThere is still plenty of time for us
to spend together, and I plan to
enjoy every moment of it.$k$pSomeday, when I look back on
these days, you will shine ever so
brightly in my memory...
はっ！
でぇい！
ううっ…！
Must focus...
Not a step closer!
This might get unpleasant.
Sleep well.
Breath of the Divine Dragon!
I sleep...
Heehee
Mmm...sleepy...
Thank you for summoning me. It's nice to be needed.
Power such as ours can be used for good or ill.
Looking at the stars always leaves me a bit lonely...
I wonder if Mar-Mar is here as well...
From "Voice" to "Hero..." I have worn many guises.
One day we will be parted, but I am glad to have met you.
Yes.
Of course.
Guide me.
